verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> and unto Aaron<WH175>, saying<WH559>,

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall encamp<WH2583> every man<WH376> by his own standard<WH1714>, with the ensigns<WH226> of their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>: over against<WH5048> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> shall they encamp<WH2583> round about<WH5439>.

And those that encamp<WH2583> on the east side<WH6924> toward the sunrising<WH4217> shall be they of the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Judah<WH3063>, according to their hosts<WH6635>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> shall be Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab<WH5992>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH7657>, were threescore and fourteen thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967>.

And those that encamp<WH2583> next unto him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar<WH3485>: and the prince<WH5387> of the<WH1121> children of Issachar<WH3485> shall be Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar<WH6686>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof<WH2572>, were fifty and four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>.
And the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun<WH2074>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> shall be Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon<WH2497>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof<WH2572>, were fifty and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>.

All that were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Judah<WH3063> were a hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fourscore<WH8084> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>, according to their hosts<WH6635>. They shall set forth<WH5265> first<WH7223>.

On the south side<WH8486> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> according to their hosts<WH6635>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> shall be Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur<WH7707>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof<WH705>, were forty and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>.

And those that encamp<WH2583> next unto him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon<WH8095>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> shall be Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai<WH6701>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH2572>, were fifty and nine<WH8672> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967>.
And the tribe<WH4294> of Gad<WH1410>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> shall be Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Reuel<WH7467>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH705>, were forty and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>.

All that were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> were a hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fifty<WH2572> and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>, according to their hosts<WH6635>. And they shall set forth<WH5265> second<WH8145>.

Then the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> shall set forward<WH5265>, with the camp<WH4264> of the Levites<WH3881> in the midst<WH8432> of the camps<WH4264>: as they encamp<WH2583>, so shall they set forward<WH5265>, every man<WH376> in his place<WH3027>, by their standards<WH1714>.

On the west side<WH3220> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their hosts<WH6635>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> shall be Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud<WH5989>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH705>, were forty thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>.
And next unto him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> shall be Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur<WH6301>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH7970>, were thirty and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and two hundred<WH3967>.
And the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin<WH1144>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> shall be Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni<WH1441>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH7970>, were thirty and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>.

All that were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> were a hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and eight<WH8083> thousand<WH505> and a hundred<WH3967>, according to their hosts<WH6635>. And they shall set<WH5265> forth third<WH7992>.

On the north side<WH6828> shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> according to their hosts<WH6635>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> shall be Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai<WH5996>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH8346>, were threescore and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967>.

And those that encamp<WH2583> next unto him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Asher<WH836>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> shall be Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran<WH5918>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH705>, were forty and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>.
And the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali<WH5321>: and the prince<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> shall be Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan<WH5881>.
And his host<WH6635>, and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them<WH2572>, were fifty and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967>.

All that were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> were a hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fifty<WH2572> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967>. They shall set<WH5265> forth hindmost<WH314> by their standards<WH1714>.

These are they that were numbered<WH6485> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>: all that were numbered<WH6485> of the camps<WH4264> according to their hosts<WH6635> were six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>.
But the Levites<WH3881> were not numbered<WH6485> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

Thus did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>, so they encamped<WH2583> by their standards<WH1714>, and so they set forward<WH5265>, every one<WH376> by their families<WH4940>, according to their fathers<WH1>' houses<WH1004>.
